original_text: And the priest shall set the woman before the Lord and unbind the hair of the woman's head and place in her hands the grain offering of remembrance, which is the grain offering of jealousy. And in his hand the priest shall have the water of bitterness that brings the curse.
korean_text: 여인을 여호와 앞에 세우고 그의 머리를 풀게 하고 기억나게 하는 소제물 곧 의심의 소제물을 그의 두 손에 두고 제사장은 저주가 되게 할 쓴 물을 자기 손에 들고

sentences.original_text: And the priest shall set the woman before the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장은 그 여인을 여호와 앞에 세울 것이요

sentences.original_text: and unbind the hair of the woman's head
sentences.korean_translation: 그 여인의 머리털을 풀게 할 것이며

sentences.original_text: and place in her hands the grain offering of remembrance
which is the grain offering of jealousy
And in his hand the priest shall have the water of bitterness
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장은 자기 손에 쓴 물을 가지고 있을 것이니
